noblePhantasms.name: Stella
noblePhantasms.detail: Deal significant damage to all enemies <strength increases with Overcharge> + apply Death to yourself [Demerit]

noblePhantasms.name: Stella
noblePhantasms.detail: Deal significant damage to all enemies ▲ <strength increases with Overcharge> + apply Death to yourself [Demerit]

comments.comment:
The legendary hero of ancient Persia.
As a warrior for King Manuchehr, who is dubbed the final king of ancient West Asia, he ended the war between the Persians and Turks that lasted 60 years.
He is the hero of salvation that gave both peoples peace and tranquility.

Height/Weight: 185cm, 75kg
Origin: Persian Mythology
Area: West Asia
Alignment: Chaotic-Balanced
Gender: Male
The skill Toughness includes anti-poison and improved resistance.

Nicknamed Arash Kamangir, which translates into "Arash the Archer" in English.
In Western Asian nations, Arash has become the symbol of the peace-bringing archers.
Even now, he is loved by many people in Western Asia.

『Stella』
Rank: B++
NP Type: Anti-Army
The Streaking Meteor. The ultimate shot to end all battles.
A long range attack that literally "splits the land."
The pure energy from the shot is comparable to an Anti-Fortress Noble Phantasm.

In legends, Arash used this ultimate shot to create a "border" between Persia and Turan.
He split the earth with a shot of 2500km.
In return for such a superhuman feat, his body shattered and he died...

From its characteristics his Noble Phantasm has a wide area of effect, so it is categorized as Anti-Army.
It is strong enough to compare to an Anti-Nation Noble Phantasm.
However, since it can only be used once, it is a Broken Phantasm in some ways.

Arash will give everything to help his Master and set human history on the proper path.
Heroes exist to save people.
Heroes dedicate their everything for people...
And even now, he has not forgotten.

voiceLines.name: Birthday
voiceLines.subtitle:
The day you were born, huh.
An auspicious occasion, shall we have a party?

voiceLines.name: During an Event
voiceLines.subtitle:
Isn't something happening?
Can you really ignore it?

voiceLines.name: Conversation 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
Ready to go anytime.
Let's save the world, Master.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
A Master, huh?
I didn't think I would be anyone's Servant again.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
If you're a suitable Master for me, then do good.
I'm relying on you.

voiceLines.name: Likes
voiceLines.subtitle: The bean paste made from chickpeas is quite good.

voiceLines.name: Dislikes
voiceLines.subtitle: I want to avoid any battles where I can't give it my all...

voiceLines.name: About the Holy Grail
voiceLines.subtitle: The Holy Grail has always perplexed both humans and Heroic Spirits.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 1
voiceLines.subtitle: I think a hero is someone who does something when it needs to be done. Not that I would know.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
I think we'll get along well, so do your best.
I'll lend you as much strength as I can.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
My Noble Phantasm is literally a meteor.
Be careful when you release its True Name.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
...To tell the truth, Master. 
I actually materialized as a Servant before.
My Master was a woman at the time.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 5
voiceLines.subtitle:
I will protect you.
Leave it to me. Just...
I only get one ultimate shot.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
You call me a Heroic Spirit.
I'd like to do some good at least.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 5
voiceLines.subtitle:
I'll follow you.
What shall we do?

voiceLines.name: Conversation 6
voiceLines.subtitle: What? Do you want something?

voiceLines.name: Level up
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 201300_0_G010]Oh. This is welcome.

voiceLines.name: Ascension 2
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 201300_0_G020]...This is it. This feeling!

voiceLines.name: Ascension 1
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 201300_0_G030]Yes, this isn't half bad.

voiceLines.name: Ascension 3
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 201300_0_G040]I'm back to my normal form!

voiceLines.name: Ascension 4
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 201300_0_G050]The Great Hero of Persia is here... Though I don't feel that special.

voiceLines.name: Summon
text: I am Arash, Hero of the East. Nice to meet you!
voiceLines.subtitle: I am Arash, Hero of the East. Nice to meet you!

voiceLines.name: Attack 1
voiceLines.subtitle: There!

voiceLines.name: Attack 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Gotcha!

voiceLines.name: Attack 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Die!

voiceLines.name: Extra Attack
voiceLines.subtitle: This arrow will split the earth.

voiceLines.name: Skill 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Let's go!

voiceLines.name: Skill 2
voiceLines.subtitle: I'll do it to my heart's content!

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 1
voiceLines.subtitle: I've decided to give it my best shot when necessary.

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 2
voiceLines.subtitle: I'll show you a meteor.

voiceLines.name: Victory 1
voiceLines.subtitle: I'm, you know, a Heroic Spirit here to finish the fight.

voiceLines.name: Victory 2
voiceLines.subtitle: It feels good to win.

voiceLines.name: Damage 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Argh!

voiceLines.name: Damage 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Aaargh!

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 1
voiceLines.subtitle: This too...can't be helped...

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 2
voiceLines.subtitle: You're not wrong...

voiceLines.name: Command Card 1
voiceLines.subtitle: All right!

voiceLines.name: Command Card 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Let's go!

voiceLines.name: Command Card 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Leave it to me!

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm Card
voiceLines.subtitle: ...All right then.
